metadata.title: Grant v. Tobacco Industry [Parts 1-4]
metadata.description: Deposition in the case of Lawrence and Susan Grant v. Dr. David Litowsky et. al. Grant smoked three packs of cigarettes a day for 30 years and contracted lung cancer. Grant had tried to quit smoking numerous times but was unable to overcome his addiction. Click Here to View Part 1 Click Here to View Part 2 Click Here to View Part 3 Click Here to View Part 4
